title: ναυαγώ ‘I become shipwrecked’, p.p.p. ναυαγισμένος ‘shipwrecked’ πεινώ ‘I am hungry’

title: For verbs which form their passive perfect participle in irregular ways
Some passive perfect participles exhibit reduplication; this will be discussed in the following section
